body: Hi Theodore, Thank you very much! I'm using ParaView to visualize the results. The case file for the last time step is attached here for your reference. The slice visualization is interesting, but the colors are in big patches: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zx76UXNCypXWUdjYre7XFTkDqHSkc8sB9WYQlnQNnGBipygINcOZCt2eLJqhK5nzzxeuwJEbcZulcyuS86uDIr1yzpDqhwW4/Image3.png)
